name: DHIS2 UI Design System
description:
DHIS2 UI Design System assets, components and styles. Use this resource to prototype, mock-up and design DHIS2 web applications.


---


Learn more about the DHIS2 Design System

Check out UI, the React library based on the DHIS2 Design System.


---


DHIS2 is the world's largest health information management system. It's open source, free and used to manage national healthcare systems in over 73 countries worldwide.
